description: Step into comfort with the Men’s Huron Pant. Made from 100% Organic Cotton for reduced water use, it’s designed for style and sustainability. Great for daily wear, the pant features a rib-knit waist and cuffs for a tailored fit and added comfort. Canada Goose branded drawstring adjusts to fit.
